author: CryptSafe
created_time: September 14, 2023, 10:57:22 AMLast edit: September 14, 2023, 12:33:10 PM by CryptSafe
content: Congratulations to telegram for launching their own crypto wallet. It has long been on the news and limelight of telegram running their own TON network for quite some years now and at last they achieved it. With their large traffic size of over 800 million users on monthly basis I think this would give them a good edge and stand on Crypto market as they already have a good utility value coupled with the fact that they just launched their own Crypto wallet. I further had to do some research and records findings of past occurrences and experience with telegram and it became pertinent that I ask these questions. I believe each telegram account holder would definitely have to create his or her own wallet possibly after an upgrade to update such features into the app. So far there have been a lot of nefarious act been done on telegram such as account cloning, account hacking and lots more and I ask what if in a situation where by one's account telegram account is hacked does that automatically grants the hacker access to the wallet? Because I believe the wallet is already built with that telegram account  irrespective of the fact that there is private key or phrase. Another question I have is this what if in the case of banning or blocking a telegram account, would the telegram team also block the wallet of the owner as well? I have to ask this because I became curious about this when I started doing my research into it. Another question I also have is this would the telegram wallet be some sorts of attached or linked to telegram username or ID of every telegram account holder?I believe we can discuss this here to knowing more and sharing ideas about this unfolding development because telegram itself has a huge number of Crypto enthusiast and I tell you there would definitely be lots of activities and engagements on telegram in the days coming and this would definitely increase lots of telegram scams and hacks which would warrant telegram account holders to strengthen their telegram security features.Your ideas are welcomed for further discussions.SOURCE
